name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forma - Beauitful New Tab From Reddit

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit images tailored to your interests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Greet yourself with a fresh image from your selection of subreddits in the new tab page!

Open source. Git repository here: https://github.com/wrightwriter/Forma

Permissions:
storage -  for pre-fetching images
downloads - for when you decide to save an image
background - for the prefetcher

First screenshot image from: https://unsplash.com/@z734923105
Second screenshot image from: https://unsplash.com/@pawel_czerwinski
